iti97:2.1: “Kalyāṇasīlo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇadhammo kalyāṇapañño imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ‘kevalī vusitavā uttamapuriso’ti vuccati—
iti97:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati, ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
iti97:3.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇasīlo hoti.
iti97:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattannaṃ bodhipakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
iti97:4.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇadhammo hoti.
iti97:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
iti97:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇapañño hoti.
iti97:6.1: Iti kalyāṇasīlo kalyāṇadhammo kalyāṇapañño imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ‘kevalī vusitavā uttamapuriso’ti vuccatī”ti.
iti97:11.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
